channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023111038
item.description:
Report X-2023111038

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-15
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: HAZMAT BOX WAS FOUND DRIPPING LIQUID OUT OF THE CORNER AND EXPANDING. UPON OPENING PACKAGE, RESPONDER FOUND TO HAVE A LOOSENED VALVE. VALVE WAS TIGHTENED AND THE LEAKING STOPPED. TAKEN TO DMP FOR DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2023110511
item.description:
Report X-2023110511

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: WINCHESTER
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE UNLOADING THE TRAILER ON DOOR 19 PACKAGE HANDLERS DISCOVERED AND LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED QA. THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE LEFT HAND SIDE OF THE TRAILER UNDER 1ST FLAP, NO OTHER BOXES ADJACENT TO HAZMAT. QA RESPONDED WITH PPE TO REMOVE PACKAGE AND CLEAN UP SPILLED CONTENTS. ALL PACKAGES AFFECTED WERE INSPECTED AND REPACKED. DescribePack: 1- 1 GALLON PLASTIC CONTAINER OF HERCULES SIZZLE, DRAIN AND WASTE SYSTEM CLEANER CAP CAME UNDONE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK THROUGH OUT THE BOX WET AND TORN DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WITH CONTENTS WERE PLACED INTO A HAZMAT BAG AND THEN INTO A HAZARDOUS WASTE BIN WITH LID.

item.title: Report X-2023101247
item.description:
Report X-2023101247

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: HOPEWELL
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Tank car was found with spilled material on the car by a FRA inspector. The release was found to be the result of the manway gasket being torn, cracked and missing sections. The manway gasket was replaced and the manway was secured. .

item.title: Report X-2023110486
item.description:
Report X-2023110486

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: MANASSAS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD BEHIND THE COMPUTER AT 7AM. CONTENT WAS CRUSHED AND POSSIBLY CAUSED THE CAP TO LOOSEN WHICH CAUSED THE LEAKAGE WHICH WET IT AS WELL AS THE BOX DescribePack: BOTTLE WAS CRUSHED WITH A LOOSED CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BOTTLES WERE OUT IN HAZMAT BAG SPILLTECH MATERIAL INSIDE TO HELP ABSORB THE WETNESS INSIDE THE DRUM

item.title: Report X-2023101233
item.description:
Report X-2023101233

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: WEST POINT
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: VA State FRA Inspector found car in holding yard with product on side of car. A white trail of product ran up to an area of the manway cover. Contractor called to secure and clean car. Contractor found gasket in manway to be bad (several cuts and grooves). Gasket was replaced.
